entities.description: The NSDUH survey used to collect information about substance use, mental health, and related factors.
Instances of illegal or harmful use of substances.
Conditions relating to mental health problems.
The state of being confined in prison.
Crimes committed to gain economic benefits.
Crimes that involve force or threat of force.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to instances of substance abuse reported in the data.
Relates the survey to instances of mental health issues reported in the data.
Substance abuse can lead to incarceration.
Substance abuse can involve crimes committed to support drug habits, such as theft or fraud.
Substance abuse can involve violent crimes.
Mental health issues are often associated with substance abuse.
